properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 4 at 2:23PM MST until February 8 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16
inches possible with localized higher amounts. Winds could gust
as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through late Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
